page.title: 17Local Arts and Crafts
page.content: The old post office has recently been renovated and converted into a studio-workshop and showroom by a {potter}and his wife,an art teacher.He exhibits his work and also teaches pottery.Fine examples of porcelain, stoneware and coloured earthenware are on display. The refurbishment of the Lady Chapel for the St.Lawrence's Centenary project has given local people a chance to use their skills.The potter made two ceramic candlesticks for the altar and also designed the cross on a griddle motif used on the cloth that hangs behind the altar.Ecchinswell Women's Institute arranged to have a craft class during the summer and one member crocheted a border on each end of the plain linen altar cloth. There is an{artist}who draws animal portraits in black and white.
